description.narrative: Evidence-based analysis underpins priority identification needed to guide the trade agenda and the Aid for Trade needs of LDCs. These analytical studies help LDCs determine their biggest constraints to trade integration, prioritize actions to address them accordingly and serve as a basis for the development community to provide trade-related support.

The DTISU seeks to provide a new perspective of trade priorities in Tanzania taking into account changes that have been unfolding at the national and international levels since the 2005 DTIS, enabling Tanzania to align its trade policy and strategies better to ongoing economic transformation initiatives, focused increasingly on the agricultural, mining and tourism sectors.

transaction.ref: Adjustment by WB - Funds already available in WB TF

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
